actor_awards.notes: A trailblazing African-American entertainer who broke racial barriers in Hollywood. She was a Kennedy Center Honoree in 1984 and received a Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award in 1989.

filmography.title: The Wiz
filmography.role_description: The Good Witch of the South who helps Dorothy believe in herself to find her way home.
filmography.plot: An adaptation of 'The Wizard of Oz' that tries to capture the essence of the African American experience.
filmography.awards: Saturn Award: Nomination – Best Supporting Actress

filmography.title: Stormy Weather
filmography.role_description: A talented singer and the love interest of a struggling dancer, in a role that became her signature.
filmography.plot: The relationship between an aspiring dancer and a popular songstress provides a retrospective of the great African-American entertainers of the early 1900s.

filmography.title: Cabin in the Sky
filmography.role_description: A seductress sent by the Devil's son to tempt a good man away from his loving wife.
filmography.plot: A compulsive gambler dies during a fight but is given six months to redeem his soul.

filmography.title: Death of a Gunfighter
filmography.role_description: The madam of a local brothel and the long-time love interest of an aging marshal.
filmography.plot: A marshal refuses to resign his post in a turn-of-the-century town, leading to a violent confrontation with the town council.

filmography.title: The Duke Is Tops
filmography.role_description: A talented singer known as 'The Bronze Venus' whose career is managed by her boyfriend.
filmography.plot: A producer sacrifices his own success to help his girlfriend become a star in New York.

filmography.title: Till the Clouds Roll By
filmography.role_description: Appears as the character Julie to perform 'Can't Help Lovin' Dat Man' in a Show Boat segment.
filmography.plot: A musical biography of composer Jerome Kern, featuring performances of his songs by various MGM stars.

filmography.title: Ziegfeld Follies
filmography.role_description: A featured singer performing 'Love' in a tropical setting.
filmography.plot: The late Florenz Ziegfeld looks down from heaven and imagines a new revue featuring the greatest MGM stars.
filmography.awards: Cannes Film Festival: Best Musical Comedy

filmography.title: Words and Music
filmography.role_description: A guest star performing 'The Lady Is a Tramp' and 'Where or When'.
filmography.plot: A fictionalized biography of the songwriting partnership of Richard Rodgers and Lorenz Hart.

filmography.title: Thousands Cheer
filmography.role_description: A performer in the military camp show singing 'Honeysuckle Rose'.
filmography.plot: An acrobat joins the army and falls for a colonel's daughter, culminating in a star-studded variety show.

filmography.title: Two Girls and a Sailor
filmography.role_description: A specialty performer singing 'Paper Doll' in a dream sequence.
filmography.plot: Two sisters love the same sailor, but he only has eyes for one of them, leading to complications.

filmography.title: Broadway Rhythm
filmography.role_description: A featured singer performing 'Brazilian Boogie' and 'Somebody Loves Me'.
filmography.plot: A Broadway producer wants a movie star for his new show, but his family wants him to use a different actress.

filmography.title: I Dood It
filmography.role_description: A singer performing with Hazel Scott and the Jimmy Dorsey Orchestra.
filmography.plot: A valet falls in love with a dancing star and they get married to spite her boyfriend, only to face a sabotage plot.

filmography.title: Swing Fever
filmography.role_description: A performer singing 'You're So Indifferent' in a nightclub scene.
filmography.plot: A talented music composer with a 'hypnotic eye' gets involved in managing a boxer.

filmography.title: Panama Hattie
filmography.role_description: A specialty singer performing exotic numbers in a Latin American setting.
filmography.plot: A brassy nightclub singer in Panama tries to win the approval of her fiancé's young daughter and high-society boss.

filmography.title: Duchess of Idaho
filmography.role_description: A guest star performing 'Baby, Come Out of the Clouds'.
filmography.plot: A woman travels to Sun Valley, Idaho to help her friend's romance but ends up in a love triangle of her own.

filmography.title: Meet Me in Las Vegas
filmography.role_description: A cameo appearance as a performer in a Las Vegas casino.
filmography.plot: A rancher discovers that holding hands with a dancer brings him good luck at the roulette tables.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination - Best Scoring of a Musical Picture

filmography.title: That's Entertainment! III
filmography.role_description: One of the hosts reflecting on the golden age of MGM musicals, introducing clips including her own deleted scenes.
filmography.plot: A documentary celebrating the history of MGM musicals with behind-the-scenes footage and cut musical numbers.

filmography.title: Boogie-Woogie Dream
filmography.role_description: A dishwasher who dreams of singing in a club, accompanied by boogie-woogie pianists.
filmography.plot: Two dishwashers in a nightclub dream of performing on stage and get their chance when the main act is delayed.
filmography.awards: National Film Registry: Inducted (2001) - Short Film
